name: observeValue(forKeyPath:of:change:context:)
desc: Informs the observing object when the value at the specified key path relative to the observed object has changed.
declaration:
func observeValue(forKeyPath keyPath: String?, 
               of object: Any?, 
           change: [NSKeyValueChangeKey : Any]?, 
          context: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
